name: Robot Reunion
description:
Made in 72 hours for the 63rd Mini Jam. 

The theme was Future, and the Limitation was the use this color palate by Grafxkid. 

Use WASD  and Space to control your player.

The Goal is to get the Player to the Female Robot.

Note: The Post Processing and the Lighting may make the colors look different. I can upload the art assets if proof is needed.
